rawData.Description: I can't remember what Mama used to put in the chili, but there is an old cookbook my Mama used in the Hospital in B0. Get it!

Conditions.TrackingCaption: Go To Hospital in B0, search for the Cookbook

quests.name: Need a few Bucks
quests.description: Need money? Grab a Rag and a bar of Soap, start cleaning the place.

rawData.Title: Need a few Bucks
rawData.Description: Need money? Grab a Rag and a bar of Soap, start cleaning the place.

quests.name: Need Sand?
quests.description: My cousin has delivered too much Sand, bring me 20 Empty Bags and I will fill them for a small price.

rawData.Title: Need Sand?
rawData.Description: My cousin has delivered too much Sand, bring me 20 Empty Bags and I will fill them for a small price.

quests.name: Parking Sensors for Lead Plates
quests.description: Lead Plates are hard to come by, bring me 10 Parking Sensors, and I can sell you some Lead Plates from the materials found.

rawData.Title: Parking Sensors for Lead Plates
rawData.Description: Lead Plates are hard to come by, bring me 10 Parking Sensors, and I can sell you some Lead Plates from the materials found.

quests.name: Plum Crazy
quests.description: Plum is having a little trouble with the locals in the town nearby. Several sketchy individuals were seen scouting on Plum's land so she has decided to send them a message about boundaries.  Plum has a plan. She's managed to capture several puppets to aid her in execution of said plan but she still needs a few more items.  Each puppet will be strapped with a molotov to it's back and an arm or a leg tied to a stick and mounted from the puppet's head to lead it into battle at the center of town.

rawData.Title: Plum Crazy
rawData.Description: Plum is having a little trouble with the locals in the town nearby. Several sketchy individuals were seen scouting on Plum's land so she has decided to send them a message about boundaries.  Plum has a plan. She's managed to capture several puppets to aid her in execution of said plan but she still needs a few more items.  Each puppet will be strapped with a molotov to it's back and an arm or a leg tied to a stick and mounted from the puppet's head to lead it into battle at the center of town.

quests.name: Repairs for Propane
quests.description: Gather a Hammer and a few Nails, I want you to fix my roof. I will give you a deal on some Propane.
requirements: Goto the General Goods Rooftop and Repair it

rawData.Title: Repairs for Propane
rawData.Description: Gather a Hammer and a few Nails, I want you to fix my roof. I will give you a deal on some Propane.

quests.name: Screwdriver Machine Now Installed

rawData.Title: Screwdriver Machine Now Installed
rawData.Description: We just got a new screwdriver making machine in the lobby. Bring me Scrap Metal, Plastic Water Bottles, and Nails to make screwdrivers.

quests.name: Stones for Grindstones

quests.name: Tools for Metal Pipes

rawData.Title: Tools for Metal Pipes

quests.name: I'm Making Cement

quests.name: Who needs the Brick Factory

quests.name: Find my package at Airfireld in Z0
quests.description: I was waiting on a package to arrive with special parts for my boat lift at the Airfield in Z0. I haven't heard if they have arrived yet, but I don't have time to check. Check it for me and I'll give you a deal on a Fishing Pole and Reel.
requirements: Go to the Airfield in Z0, check if the package has arrived.

rawData.Title: Find my package at Airfireld in Z0

quests.name: The Broken Boat

quests.name: Wrecked Boat Model
quests.description: My crew wrecked their boat! Follow the coast from the A0 Outpost east until you reach the bridge, under the bridge you will find an old boat. Check the model so I can get it repaired.
requirements: Find the boat model from the wrecked boat in A0

quests.name: The Fish Run

requirements: Bring a Tuna to Each Harbourmaster

quests.name: Build a Laika
quests.description: We've finally got everything we need to build you a Laika EXCEPT these last items. Find me a Car Battery, an alternator, a Front Left Seat, and 4 Tires for a Laika. After you find these items, pick me out a chassis at the Junkyard.
requirements: Pick a Chassis out from the Junkyard

quests.name: Supplies for Laika Trunk Doors & Back Bumper
quests.description: These scum bag drivers are dropping damaged goods because they can't close their storage containers! These supplies will help me build more Laika Trunk Doors and Back Bumpers. Get me 30 pieces of Scrap Metal, 10 Bolts, and 20 pieces of Rubber. You might find some supplies in the Car Garage at the Prison, C2
requirements: Check the Car Garage at the Prison, C2
rewards: 1x Laika Bumper Back Item (400 Credits each)

rawData.Description: Bring me 4 Salt Bags and I'll sell you two Batteries, just do it.

quests.name: Bolt for Bolts
quests.description: I ordered some custom bolts from a powerful squad, but something tells me they took my money and ran. Check the rally point at the Gas Station in Z3
requirements: Check the rally point at the Gas Station in Z3

rawData.Title: Bolt for Bolts

quests.name: Lost Love
quests.description: I had a date last night, but she never showed up. The last time we talked, she was about to leave her home in Apatija, in A1. Go see if she left, or met her fate.
requirements: Find the car belonging to the mechanics date in Apatrija, A1

quests.name: Quick Cash
quests.description: Need money? Grab a Rag and a bar of Soap, start cleaning the place.

quests.name: Where is the radio
quests.description: Radios are rare around here, and a one of a kind radio was spotted in Preko, in B4, check if it is still in Preko, B4
requirements: Check a vehicle for a radio in Preko, B4

quests.name: Half Priced Gasoline
quests.description: Want some cheap gas? Stop throwing your canisters away, bring them to me. If you can turn on the pumps at any of these Gas Stations, I can get you cheap gas!
requirements: Turn on the gas pumps at any of the marked Gas Stations
